channel.title: Ipban and givemod, Admn, owner help
channel.description: Hi, I own a server and on it the ipban is broken and givemod giveadmin and giveowner are broken. In the givemod and admin and owner i have to kick myself before i give them the staff. Help?

item.title: Ipban and givemod, Admn, owner help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.source: Ipban and givemod, Admn, owner help

item.title: Ipban and givemod, Admn, owner help
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:11, topic:319679”]Notice how it says equalsIgnoreCase.
It’s ignoring your name for your command.
I think…[/quote]

Fail.

equalsIgnoreCase means it will accept all names within the range given. Hence “wwe justin”

It’ll accept the command even if your name is
wWe JuSTin
WWe JUSTIN
ect.

Read full topic
item.source: Ipban and givemod, Admn, owner help

item.title: Ipban and givemod, Admn, owner help
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

[color=green]ADMIN[/color]

if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("wwe justin")) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sendMessage("You have promoted to Administrator by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.playerRights = 2; savegame(true); sendMessage("You've promoted "+command.substring(4)+" to Administrator."); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

MOD
else if (command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“wwe justin”)) {
String name = command.substring(4);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been promoted to Moderator by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 1;
savegame(true);
sendMessage(“You’ve promoted “+command.substring(4)+” to Moderator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

OWNER
else if (command.startsWith(“giveowner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“wwe justin”)) {
String name = command.substring(4);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sendMessage(“You have been promoted to Co Owner by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 3;
savegame(true);
sendMessage(“You’ve promoted “+command.substring(4)+” to Co Owner.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

BTW ON GIVEADMIN GIVEMOD AND OWNER IT SAYS
if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“wwe justin”))
if (command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“wwe justin”))
if (command.startsWith(“giveowner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“wwe justin”))

THE WWE JUSTIN JUSTIN PART MEANS ONLY THAT USER CAN DO THAT COMMAND SO CHNAGE WWE JUSTIN TO YOUR INGAME USER

HOPE THIS HELP =p

Read full topic
item.source: Ipban and givemod, Admn, owner help

item.title: Ipban and givemod, Admn, owner help
item.dc:creator: @suppyscape suppyscape
item.description:
@suppyscape wrote:

[quote=“wwe justin, post:3, topic:319679”]give us the givemod, giveadmin and give owner code so i know to fix[/quote] [code] else if (command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
String name = command.substring(8);

		try
		{
			int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
			client c = (client)server.playerHandler.players[p];

			c.playerRights = 1;
			c.savemoreinfo();
			c.savechar();
			c.disconnected = true;
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Moderator");
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
		}
	}[/code] give mod ^^

[code] if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
String name = command.substring(10);

		try
		{
			int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
			client c = (client)server.playerHandler.players[p];

			c.playerRights = 2;
			c.savemoreinfo();
			c.savechar();
			c.disconnected = true;
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
		}
	}[/code]

Give Admin ^^

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“giveowner”)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Pkboy”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);

try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a co-owner");
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(name + " either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");[/code]
Give Owner ^^

Read full topic
